I18nSelectorWidget.label-i18n-select: Select and add an internationalization to make it available

StoryEditorWidget.label-use-this-link-or-scan-this-qrcode-: Follow this link or scan this QR code to play the story
StoryEditorWidget.label-groups: Manage groups and specific missions for each one
StoryEditorWidget.label-export-server-description: The current story loaded in the application will be uploaded to the server with the provided name. If a story with the same name already exists on the server, it will be replaced with this version
StoryEditorWidget.label-valid-json: The provided file is a valid story
StoryEditorWidget.label-invalid-json: The provided file is an invalid story. Retry providing .json valid story
StoryEditorWidget.label-empty-tabs-down: Create a new story using the Add button.

group.label: Group mode
group.description: The players collaborate with each other

class.label: Class mode
class.description: The groups play one against each other

MissionEditorWidget.label-add-and-edit-missions: Add and edit missions of the current story
MissionEditorWidget.label-select-mission-to-edit-properties-: Select a mission to edit order, properties here and to edit its activities "@:ActivityEditorWidget.label-activity-tab" tab

ActivityEditorWidget.label-if-condition-match-will-hint-evalu: If this condition match will hint evaluator to evaluate the activity
ActivityEditorWidget.label-point-assignment: Set points amount to add o decrement to score
ActivityEditorWidget.label-condition-required-to-continue-pla: Condition required to continue playing this story route
ActivityEditorWidget.label-mission-activity-tree-of: Tree of possible activities into the mission:
ActivityEditorWidget.label-select-mission-to-edit-activities: Select a mission to add and edit its activities
ActivityEditorWidget.label-select-nodeType: Select a type of element to add to the tree

quest.label: Quest
quest.description: Create an interactive activity which will create a branch of possible results

branch.label: Branch
branch.description: Describes a possible path of the story

ActivityEditorWidget.tnt-desc: Insert a {value}, pressing Remove will delete the last element chosen, Save confirms the value
ActivityEditorWidget.array-desc: Insert elements in a list by pressing Add or press Remove to eliminate the value typed in the input text, Save confirms the list
ActivityEditorWidget.range-desc: Insert the minimum and maximum condition
ActivityEditorWidget.function-desc: Select parameter and advanced type of condition

GridWidget.label-scene-description: The scene represents what the player has seen since starting this activity. The scene is a grid made up of rows and cells; Each cell is associated with a customizable component of your choice. One of these components can be an additional grid that can also be used to create a nested layered structure
GridWidget.label-scene-input-description: When the player interacts with a scene component, it provide a value (set by you) to help and inform you how the player interacted or responded activity. You can use this value to evaluate the response and advance the story with a possible different outcome via the "@:ActivityEditorWidget.treeNode-type.branch.label" activity. This value is stored in a variable with the name of your choice, which you can customize when you change the component properties. Remember which component the variable is associated with because you will need it if you use it in the "@:ActivityEditorWidget.treeNode-type.branch.label"
GridWidget.label-scene-input-details: You can specify to have user interactions evaluated only after they interact with a "@:UserWidgets.label-button-widget-name" component of type "@:shared.label-submit". If this is not in the scene, the evaluation of the activity will take place immediately after having made any interaction with an interactable component
GridWidget.label-populate-grid-with-rows-and-cells-: Populate grid with rows and cells to customize the widgets as you need.
GridWidget.label-show-grid-border: Show cell borders on the grid
GridWidget.label-edit-cell-widget: Set the widget to use inside the cell

StyleEditorWidget.label-custom-stylesheet-description: Include your favorite stylesheet among those you have uploaded to the platform
StyleEditorWidget.label-select-custom-stylesheet: Select your own custom style sheet

AttributeEditorWidget.label-variable-name-is-used-to-check-spe: Variable name is used to check specific user input in branch condition
AttributeEditorWidget.label-placeholder-insert-class: Insert class and add it pressing "@:shared.label-add" button or "Enter", "Space" key buttons
AttributeEditorWidget.label-add-custom-classes-or-pick-some-fr: Add your custom classes or pick some from the provided framework

Grid.label-use-auto-generated-indexes: Use auto generated row and column indexes for accessibility purpose in grid
Grid.label-indexes_aria-rowcount_aria-colcoun: Use attributes aria-rowcount, aria-colcount, aria-rowindex, aria-colindex when possible
Grid.label-disable-it-if-using-for-layout-onl: Disable it if using for layout only
Grid.label-selection-provide-player-input-as-: Provide player input as grid coordinates into 0-based index (row, cell)
Grid.label-its-recommended-to-enable-grid-nav: It's recommended to enable grid navigation for accessibility purpose if used
Grid.label-current-unselected-cell-while-navi: Current, active cell while navigating/interacting with grid

Photo.label-select-type-media: Select a media type to capture

QrDecoder.label-id-of-message: ID to assign to the notification element if you want apply a custom style
QrDecoder.label-error-message-content: Main content of the error message
QrDecoder.label-error-message-to-show-if-no-qr-has: Recommended: Error message notification to show if no QR code has been detected after scan, for example a message to help player to take a not blurred picture, with the QR code on center

areas.label-set-value-to-return-as-player-inpu: Set value to return as player input
areas.label-add-anchor-to-scroll-onto-when-tri: Add anchor to scroll onto when triggered
areas.label-add-url-to-open-when-triggered: Add url to open when triggered

actions.label-open-url-new-tab: Open url in a new tab

AssetsManager.label-asset-name-description: Rename this asset with the name you want
AssetsManager.label-stories-that-depend-by-asset: Stories that depend by the asset

ActivityQuestEditor.label-choose-behavior-on-what-should-hap: Choose behavior on what should happen when user response doesn't match any child "@:ActivityEditorWidget.treeNode-type.branch.label" activity
ActivityQuestEditor.label-activity-behaviors: The options "@:ActivityQuestEditor.label-nothing","@:ActivityQuestEditor.label-show-message" won't continue the story to a new activity, but "@:ActivityQuestEditor.label-continue-on-next-activity-in-sequence" will continue the story starting from next "sibling" activity in sequence

QrCodeGenerator.label-qr-codes-use-description: Use @:UtilitySectionWidget.label-qr-code-generator to save and generate QR codes so you can use the widget "@:UserWidgets.label-qr-decode-widget-name" in any activity you want
QrCodeGenerator.label-save-qrcodes-in-one-place-and-prin: Keep aside QR codes you need in this story in one easy place, so you can use or print them later
QrCodeGenerator.label-add-named-qr-codes-for-future-use: Add QR codes with the names you want and will be there for later uses
QrCodeGenerator.label-value-stored-in-qr-code: Value stored in QR code for scan result
